testcase.brief: One pair 1:1NAT on tunnel over eth0 Platform Dependence BR100,BR200,BRAP330,BRAP350
testcase.description: Topology to use Topo4 Description One pair 1:1NAT on tunnel over eth0 Platform Dependence BR100,BR200,BRAP330,BRAP350 Pre-condition 1. establish vpn tunnel between eth0 of BR and CVG Test procedure 1. Configure non-routable subnet on br 2. Configure routable subnet on br 3. Configure a 1:1 nat policy on br 4. apply the 1:1 nat policy on tunnel over eth0 5. pc connect to the br lan interface 6. pc send traffic to vpn network, check result1 7. pc send traffic to internet ,check result 2 8. no the 1:1 nat policy on tunnel over eth0 9. pc send traffic to vpn network, check result3 Expect result 1. traffic to vpn network via tunnel, the traffic are 1:1 nat translation before through VPN tunnel. source ip address is non-routable ip at first, then 1:1 nat translation to routable ip .pc can connect to vpn network 2. traffic to internet via eth0, the traffic are nat translation before through eth0. source ip address is non-routable ip at first, then nat translation eth0 interface ip .pc can connect to internet. 3. traffic to vpn network via tunnel, the traffic can’t be any type nat transfer before through VPN tunnel.

step.desc: Enable 2 dhcp server（vlan${br1.vpc1.vlan} vlan${br1.vpc4.vlan}） on BR
step.telnet: -v "interface ${br1.br.wan.int1} mode wan" -v "interface vlan${br1.vpc1.vlan} ip ${br1.br.mgt0.1.ip}/24" -v "interface vlan${br1.vpc1.vlan} dhcp-server options default-gateway ${br1.br.mgt0.1.ip}" -v "interface vlan${br1.vpc1.vlan} dhcp-server ip-pool ${br1.br.mgt0.1.ip_pool_start} ${br1.br.mgt0.1.ip_pool_end}" -v "interface vlan${br1.vpc4.vlan} ip ${br1.br.mgt0.4.ip}/24" -v "interface vlan${br1.vpc4.vlan} dhcp-server options default-gateway ${br1.br.mgt0.4.ip}" -v "interface vlan${br1.vpc4.vlan} dhcp-server ip-pool ${br1.br.mgt0.4.ip_pool_start} ${br1.br.mgt0.4.ip_pool_end}" -v "interface vlan${br1.vpc1.vlan} dhcp-server enable" -v "interface vlan${br1.vpc4.vlan} dhcp-server enable"

-v "routing internal-sub-network ${br1.br.mgt0.1.ip}/${br.mgt0.supermask}" -v "routing internal-sub-network ${br1.br.mgt0.4.ip}/${br.mgt0.supermask}" -v "interface ${br1.br.lan.int1} switchport mode access" -v "interface ${br1.br.lan.int1} switchport access vlan ${br1.vpc1.vlan}" -v "interface ${br1.br.lan.int4} switchport mode trunk" -v "interface ${br1.br.lan.int4} switchport trunk native vlan ${br1.vpc4.vlan}"

step.multi-setvar: echo "br1.br.mgt0.1.route=$(echo ${br1.br.mgt0.1.ip} | cut -d. -f1,2,3).0" echo "br1.br.mgt0.2.route=$(echo ${br1.br.mgt0.4.ip} | cut -d. -f1,2,3).0" echo "cvg1.dns1.route=$(echo ${cvg1.dns1.ip} | cut -d. -f1,2,3).0" echo "cvg1.dns2.route=$(echo ${cvg1.dns2.ip} | cut -d. -f1,2,3).0" echo "cvg1.vpc1.route=$(echo ${cvg1.vpc1.tif.ip} | cut -d. -f1,2,3).0"

step.desc: check ip routing table on cvg
check ip routing table on br,br can get route from cvg
1. Configure 1 port forwarding nat policy for ssh tcp on br
step.telnet: -v "ip nat-policy auto${job.id} type match-net inside ${br1.br.mgt0.1.ip}/${br.lan.netmask} outside ${vpc1.outside.subnet}/${br.lan.netmask}" -v "vpn ipsec-tunnel ${br1.tunnel.name} nat-policy auto${job.id}" -v "routing internal-sub-network ${vpc1.outside.subnet}/${br.lan.netmask}" -v "show ip nat-policy"

step.desc: check ip routing table on cvg
vpc1 connect to lan port eth1
set br1.vpc1.tif.ip var for vpc1 on BR side
enable debug on BR _ff id 1 protocol 47, _ff id 2 protocol 47, _ff id 1 protocol 1
step.telnet: -v "clear log buffered" -v "_ff id 1 protocol 1" -v "_ff id 2 protocol 47 bidirectional" -v "_ff id 3 protocol 50 bidirectional" -v "_kdebug fe basic" -v "_kdebug fe detail"

step.desc: vpc1 send traffic to vpn network cvg1,ping is successful and there are the 1:1nat
show logging buffered,ping is ofrwarded on tunnel and there are the 1:1nat
vpc1 ping internet,ping is successful and there are not the 1:1nat
show logging buffered,the ping traffic is forwarded on wan interface and not 1:1 nat
no the 1:1 nat on the tunnel
vpc1 send traffic to vpn network cvg1,ping is forwarded on tunnel but there are not the 1:1nat
show logging buffered,ping is forwarded on tunnel and there are not the 1:1nat
show log buffer on br if the case failed
